analysis.key_quote: I write to express opposition to the Proposed Rule. I am an average citizen who cannot believe that any rule change that permits the arbitrary political firing of civil servants would do anything but lead to greater incompetence in agencies that provide vital services to the American people.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization and the erosion of merit-based hiring and retention practices, which are fundamental to civil service protections.
